reference.title: cxxClassTemplateParameter
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxClassTemplateParameter> element describes one of the template types used by a C++ class template.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxClassTemplateParameters> element contains one or more <cxxClassTemplateParameter> child elements. <cxxClassTemplateParameter> requires the child element <cxxClassTemplateParameterType> to indicate the type of parameter. <cxxClassTemplateParameter> may also contain the child element <apiDefNote> to describe the parameter further.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxClassTemplateParameters> <cxxClassTemplateParameter> <cxxClassTemplateParameterType>typename T</cxxClassTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the first function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxClassTemplateParameter> <cxxClassTemplateParameter> <cxxClassTemplateParameterType>typename U</cxxClassTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the second function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxClassTemplateParameter> </cxxClassTemplateParameters>
